unit.name: Bloodthirster (of Khorne)
unit.description: Equipment: Hand weapon. Special Rules: Flying Model, Terror, Large Target, Eternal Hatred, MR (1).

unit.name: Great Unclean One (of Nurgle)
unit.description: Magic: This model is a Level 4 wizard. Equipment: Hand weapon. Special Rules: Terror, Large Target, Poisoned Attacks (1).

unit.name: Keeper of Secrets (of Slaanesh)
unit.description: Magic: This model is a Level 4 wizard. Equipment: Hand weapon. Special Rules: Terror, Large Target, AP (1).

unit.name: Lord of Change (of Tzeentch)
unit.description: Magic: This model is a Level 4 wizard. Equipment: Hand weapon. Special Rules: Flying Model, Terror, Large Target.

unit.name: Daemon Prince
unit.description: Equipment: Hand weapon. Special Rules: Terror.

unit.name: Daemon Prince of Khorne
unit.description: Equipment: Hand weapon. Special Rules: Terror, Eternal Hatred, MR (1).

unit.name: Daemon Prince of Nurgle
unit.description: Equipment: Hand weapon. Special Rules: Terror.

unit.name: Daemon Prince of Slaneesh
unit.description: Equipment: Hand weapon. Special Rules: Terror, ASF.

unit.name: Daemon Prince of Tzeentch
unit.description: Magic: This model is a Level 2 wizard. Equipment: Hand weapon. Special Rules: Terror, Daemonic Ward Save (4+).

unit.name: Battle Standard of Khorne
unit.description: Equipment: Hand weapon. Special Rules: Killing Blow, Eternal Hatred, Scaly Skin (6+), MR (1), Martial Honour.

unit.name: Battle Standard of Nurgle
unit.description: Equipment: Hand weapon. Special Rules: Poisoned Attacks (1), Cloud of Flies, Regeneration (6+).

unit.name: Battle Standard of Slaneesh
unit.description: Equipment: Hand weapon. Special Rules: AP (1), ASF.

unit.name: Battle Standard of Tzeentch
unit.description: Magic: This model is a Level 2 wizard. Special Rules: Daemonic Ward Save (4+).

unit.name: Herald of Khorne
unit.description: Equipment: Hand weapon. Special Rules: Killing Blow, Eternal Hatred, Scaly Skin (6+), MR (1), Martial Honour, Locus of Khorne.

unit.name: Herald of Nurgle
unit.description: Equipment: Hand weapon. Special Rules: Poisoned Attacks (1), Cloud of Flies, Regeneration (6+), Locus of Nurgle.

unit.name: Herald of Slaneesh
unit.description: Equipment: Hand weapon. Special Rules: AP (1), ASF, Locus of Slaanesh.

unit.name: Herald of Tzeentch
unit.description: Magic: This model is a Level 2 wizard. Equipment: Hand weapon. Special Rules: Daemonic Ward Save (4+), Locus of Tzeentch.

unit.name: Bloodletter of Khorne
unit.description: Equipment: Hand weapon. Special Rules: Killing Blow, Hatred, Scaly Skin (6+), MR (1).

unit.name: Plaguebearer of Nurgle
unit.description: Equipment: Hand weapon. Special Rules: Poisoned Attacks (1), Cloud of Flies.

unit.name: Daemonette of Slaanesh
unit.description: Equipment: Hand weapon. Special Rules: Light Infantry, Feigned Flight.

unit.name: Pink Horror of Tzeentch
unit.description: Equipment: Hand weapon. Special Rules: Spellcaster.

unit.name: Flesh Hound of Khorne
unit.description: Equipment: Hand weapon. Special Rules: Light Cavalry, Hatred, MR (2).

unit.name: Nurglings
unit.description: Equipment: Hand weapon. Special Rules: Skirmish, Scouts, Small.

unit.name: Seeker of Slaanesh
unit.description: Equipment: Hand weapon. Special Rules: Light Cavalry, Feigned Flight, Poisoned Attacks (1) (Steed of Slaanesh only).

unit.name: Screamer of Tzeentch
unit.description: Equipment: Hand weapon. Special Rules: Flying Unit, Slashing Attacks.

unit.name: Chaos Fury
unit.description: Equipment: Hand weapon. Special Rules: Flying Skirmishers.

unit.name: Skull Cannon of Khorne
unit.description: Chariot: AS 4+, 2 Blood Letter Crew. Equipment: Skull Cannon. Special Rules: Hatred, MR (1), Impact Hits (D3+2), Killing Blow (Crew only) Note: Does not count against the number of Chariots in the army!

unit.name: Seeker Chariot of Slaanesh
unit.description: Chariot: AS 6+, 2 Daemonette Crew, 2 Steeds of Slaanesh. Equipment: Hand weapon. Special Rules: Impact Hits (D3+2), Poisoned Attacks (1) (Steed of Slaanesh only)

unit.name: Burning Chariot of Tzeentch
unit.description: Chariot: AS 5+, 1 Exalted Flamer Crew, 3 Horror Crew, 2 Screamers of Tzeentch. Equipment: Hand weapon. Special Rules: Flying Model, Impact Hits (D3+1), Exalted Flamer.

unit.name: Beast of Nurgle
unit.description: Equipment: Hand weapon. Special Rules: Poisoned Attacks (1), Regeneration (4+), Slime Trail.

unit.name: Fiend of Slaanesh
unit.description: Equipment: Hand weapon. Special Rules: AP(1), Soporific Musk.

unit.name: Exalted Flamer of Tzeentch
unit.description: Equipment: Hand weapon. Special Rules: Exalted Flamer.

unit.name: Plague Drones of Nurgle
unit.description: Equipment: Special Rules: Flying Unit, Poisoned Attacks (1), Cloud of Flies.

unit.name: Changebringer of Tzeentch
unit.description: Equipment: Hand weapon, Special Rules: Flying Skirmishers (15"), Flames of Tzeentch

unit.name: Blood Crushers of Khorne
unit.description: Mount: Juggernaut. Equipment: Hand weapon. Special Rules: Heavy Cavalry, Killing Blow, MR (1), Scaly Skin (4+), Hatred (Blood Crusher only).

unit.name: Flamer of Tzeentch
unit.description: Equipment: Hand weapon. Special Rules: Skirmish, Flames of Tzeentch.

unit.name: Skull Throne of Khorne
unit.description: Chariot: AS 4+, 2 Blood Letter Crew, 1 Exalted Blood Letter Crew. Equipment: Hand weapon. Special Rules: Killing Blow (Crew only), Hatred, MR (1), Impact Hits (D3+2), Skull Throne. Note: Does not count against the number of Chariots in the army in regard to point costs!.

unit.name: Exalted Seeker Chariot of Slaanesh
unit.description: Chariot: AS 5+, 1 Exalted Daemonette Crew, 3 Daemonette Crew, 4 Steeds of Slaanesh. Equipment: Hand weapon. Special Rules: Impact Hits (D3+4), Poisoned Attacks (1) (Steed of Slaanesh only).

unit.name: Soul Grinder
unit.description: Equipment: Hand weapon. Special Rules: Terror, Large Target, Unreliable.

mount.name: Juggernaut of Khorne
mount.description: Equipment: Chaos Armour and hand weapon. Special Rules: Killing Blow.

mount.name: Palanquin of Nurgle
mount.description: Equipment: Hand weapon. Special Rules: Palanquin of Nurgle.

mount.name: Steed of Slaanesh
mount.description: Equipment: Hand weapon. Special Rules: Light Cavalry, Poisoned Attacks (1).

mount.name: Disc of Tzeentch
mount.description: Equipment: Hand weapon. Special Rules: Flying Model (15"), Disc of Tzeentch.

mount.name: Blood Chariot of Khorne
mount.description: Chariot: AS 4+, 1 Juggernaut of Khorne. Equipment: Hand weapon. Special Rules: Impact Hits (D3+2), Killing Blow (Juggernaut only).

mount.name: Blazing Chariot of Tzeentch
mount.description: Chariot: AS 5+, 2 Screamers of Tzeentch. Equipment: Hand weapon. Special Rules: Flying Model, Impact Hits (D3+1).

mount.name: Exalted Seeker Chariot of Slaanesh
mount.description: Chariot: AS 5+, 1 Exalted Daemonette Crew, 3 Daemonette Crew, 4 Steeds of Slaanesh. Equipment: Hand weapon. Special Rules: Impact Hits (D3+4), Poisoned Attacks (1) (Steed of Slaanesh only).

mount.name: Seeker Chariot of Slaanesh
mount.description: Chariot: AS 6+, 2 Daemonette Crew, 2 Steeds of Slaanesh. Equipment: Hand weapon. Special Rules: Impact Hits (D3+2), Poisoned Attacks (1) (Steed of Slaanesh only)

item.name: Affiliation
item.description: Some Chaos units are devoted to one of the 4 Chaos deities (Khorne, Nurgle, Slaanesh and Tzeentch). The affiliation of a unit is determined either by its mark (e.g. Mark of Tzeentch) or name (e.g. Hellstriders of Slaanesh, Bloodletters of Khorne. Nurglings are affiliated with Nurgle.). All other units are considered to have no affiliation. Characters may only join units with the same affiliation as themselves or no affiliation, except for character models with no affiliation which are not restricted and free to join units independent of their affiliation.

item.name: Allure of Slaanesh
item.description: units in btb with one or more models with this gift suffer -1Ld

item.name: Armour of Khorne
item.description: 4+AS that cannot be improved further, in addition magical weapons of models in btb contact lose their special abilities (i.e. count as common weapons of their kind) as long as they stay in btb contact with this model.

item.name: Avatar
item.description: This model never suffers a Warp Collapse, instead it loses a number of wound equal to the amount it failed the break test by.

item.name: BM Blissful Throes
item.description: (8+) MM, Range 12", D6 S6 hits

item.name: BM Blue Fire of Metamorphose
BM Blue Fire of Metamorph.
item.description: (9+) MM, Range 24", 2D6 S(2+D3) hits

item.name: BM Dark Hand of Death
item.description: (5+) MM, Range 24", D6 S4 hits

item.name: BM Delectable Torture
item.description: (7+) Hex, Range 24". Target character model (but not his mount) attacks the unit he is in, models are hit automatically and hits are allocated like shooting. Wounds inflicted do not count for combat resolution but may result in a panic test.

item.name: BM Delicious Excruciation
item.description: (8+) Augment, Range 12", unit is Stubborn until the casters next magic phase

item.name: BM Doom and Darkness
item.description: (9+) Hex, Range 24", target unit suffers a -3 modifier on all Ld based tests until casters next magic phase.

item.name: BM Effulgent Boils
item.description: (8+) MM, Range 24", D6 S4 hits, no AS

item.name: BM Enrapturing Spasms
item.description: (10+) Hex, Range 18". Choose effect A), B) or C): - A) In its next movment phase, target unit cannot charge and may only reform but not move otherwise. - B) In its next magic phase, target unit cannot cast spells. - C) In its next shooting phase, target unit cannot use ranged attacks.

item.name: BM Favoured Poxes
item.description: (7+) Hex, Range 18", target unit suffers -1WS, BS, S and Ld (to min. of 1) until the casters next magic phase

item.name: BM Glistening Scabs
item.description: (8+) Hex, Range 18". Target character model within LOS suffers -1T (to min. of 1) until the end of the game.

item.name: BM Glorious Affliction
item.description: (8+) Hex, Range 24". Target unit halves its M (rounding up) including mounts. Flyers have to use their ground movement but do not half their M. Lasts until the casters next magic phase.

item.name: BM Green Fire of Mutation
item.description: (9+) DD, Range 24". Target unit attacks itself. Each model makes a single attack (weapon option of Chaos players choice) and hits are allocated like shooting. Has no effect on mounts and character models. The Block special rule has no effect against damage suffered from this spell.

item.name: BM Hand of Dust
item.description: (5+) One enemy unit in btb with the caster suffers D6 S4 hits

item.name: BM Hellshriek
item.description: (8+) Hex, Range 18", needs LOS. Target unit has to take a panic test. Has no effect on units that are Immune to Psychology.

item.name: BM Luxurious Torment
item.description: (8+) Augment or Hex, Range 24", target unit gets Frenzy and suffers D6 S3 hits at the end of each magic phase (both players). If the target unit is affiliated to Slaanesh, it gains Frenzy. If the target unit is not affiliated to Slaanesh, it suffers from Stupidity. Lasts until the casters next magic phase.

item.name: BM Magnificent Buboes
item.description: (7+) Range 24", single enemy model within LOS suffers a S4 hit with no AS

item.name: BM Pandemonium
item.description: (8+) RIP, enemy units gain no benefit from Inspiring Presence and Hold Your Ground!

item.name: BM Pestilence
item.description: (11+) Hex, Range 24", RIP, When the spell is successfully cast as well as at the start of each players magic phase the target suffers D6 S3 no AS hits.

item.name: BM Red Fire of Alteration
item.description: (5+) MM, Range 30", D6 S(D6) hits

item.name: BM Shades of Death
item.description: (6+) Augment, Range 18", unit causes Fear. If it already causes Fear, unit causes Terror instead. Lasts until casters next magic phase

item.name: BM Violet Fire of Tzeentch
item.description: (7+) DD, Range 24", target has to take a Ld-Test. If it fails, it suffers a wound with no AS for each point it failed the test. Wounds are allocated like shooting.

item.name: BM Wind of Death
item.description: (9+) MM, Range 24", 2D6 S4 hits

item.name: BM Word of Pain
item.description: (9+) Hex, Range 24", target units WS and BS is reduced to 1 until casters next magic phase.

item.name: BM Yellow Fire of Transformation
BM Yellow Fire of Transfor.
item.description: (4+) Augment, caster, his mount and unit (including other character models) get a Ward Save (5+) until the casters next magic phase.

item.name: Banner of Blank Despair
item.description: All enemy units within 12" suffer -1 to their leadership

item.name: Banner of Change
item.description: PM 2/5+, Hand of Dust spell

item.name: Banner of Ecstasy
item.description: The unit loses the Light Infantry and Feigned Flight special rule. The banner has to be revealed when the unit is deployed.

item.name: Banner of Glorious Chaos
item.description: all daemonic units within 12" are Stubborn

item.name: Banner of Insidious Putrefaction
Banner of Insid. Putre.
item.description: Unit rerolls to-wound rolls of natural 1s. Has no effect on character models.

item.name: Banner of Magic Deprivation
Banner of Magic Deprivat.
item.description: All enemy wizards suffer -1 to their BM casting rolls.

item.name: Banner of Perpetual Virulence
Ban. of Perpetual Virul.
Bann. of Perpetual Virul.
item.description: Models that attack this unit in cc suffer a S3 hit for each successful to-wound roll.

item.name: Banner of Unholy Triumph
item.description: +D3 CR

item.name: Banner of Witchcraft
item.description: Unit gets +1 to all casting rolls. Has no effect on character models.

item.name: Battle Axe of Khorne
item.description: Killing Blow, in addition each to-wound roll of a natural 6 causes D3 wounds (after saves)

item.name: Beacon of Chaos
item.description: If this model is the general of the army, its range for Inspiring Presence is 18".

item.name: Blade of the Ether
item.description: cc attacks ignore AS

item.name: Bolt Thrower
item.description: Range 48", S6, D3 wounds, no AS, penetrates ranks

item.name: Chaos Armour
item.description: 4+ AS

item.name: Chaos Disruption
item.description: Units shooting at this model suffer -1BS (to a minimum of 0) for this attack.

item.name: Cloud of Flies
item.description: Models attacking this unit suffer -1 to their to-hit rolls in cc.

item.name: Collar of Khorne
item.description: MR(2)

item.name: Corona
item.description: At the start of each players magic phase, all enemy models in btb contact suffer a S3 hit.

item.name: Daemonic
item.description: - Cause Fear - Daemonic Ward Save (5+) - Immune to Psychology - Magical attacks - Instability: When a daemonic unit loses combat it has to take a break test with the following exceptions: - Flux Disruption: If the unit fails to pass its break test and the roll is equal to or less than the leadership of the unit, it suffers a number of wounds equal to the amount it failed the test by (no saves of any kind allowed). Character models in units are only affected if the unit is destroyed and there are unallocated wounds left. In this case wounds are distributed evenly between the character models (randomise odd wounds). - Warp Collapse: If the unit fails to pass its break test and the roll is higher than the leadership of the unit including any character models in the unit, it is destroyed Notes: - Ld-bonuses from characters and the Gold Your Ground! special rule can be used as normal. - Should a unit also benefit from Stubborn, it then does not suffer wounds because of Flux Disruption.

item.name: Daemonic Pact
item.description: If the army is led by a general from the Daemons of Chaos list, then any daemonic units (but not characters), i.e. independent of their affiliation, may be included in the core warband (see Composition).

item.name: Daemonic Robes
item.description: Model may never be wounded on better than 3+.

item.name: Diabolic Splendour
item.description: The Daemonic Ward Save turns into a normal Ward Save.

item.name: Disc of Tzeentch
item.description: The model counts as a Large Target for LOS purposes.

item.name: Disciple of Khorne
item.description: The model may attempt to dispel spells as if it was a wizard.

item.name: Dispel Scroll
item.description: Automatically dispels one spell without the need of DD. One use only.

item.name: Eternal Hatred
item.description: The model/unit hates all enemies and re-rolls all failed tohit rolls in every cc round.

item.name: Exalted Flamer
item.description:
The model counts as being equipped with the following ranged weapon:
• Flamer weapon, Range 0", S4, AP(1), units that suffer one or more casualties must pass a panic test. Cannot stand and shoot. A misfire only results in the weapon not shooting and has no further effect.

item.name: Favour of the Gods
item.description: When the model is affected by the Eye of the Gods spell, it may modify its roll by 1.

item.name: Feigned Flight
item.description: This unit may choose Flee as a charge response and automatically rallies in its next rally phase (even if unit size is below 25%) if it is not caught. It is also free to move during the remaining moves part of the movement phase (even if it is not Light Cavalry).

item.name: Flail of Decay
item.description: no AS, in addition each to-wound roll of 6 causes 2 wounds (after saves)

item.name: Flames of Tzeentch
item.description: Each Flamer of Tzeentch counts as being equipped with the following ranged weapon: Thrown weapon, Range 8", S3, AP(1), Multiple Shots (D6)

item.name: Gaze of Acquiescence
item.description: One model of the Daemon players choice in btb with the model takes a Ld test at the start of each cc phase. If failed victim may not attack that turn. Has no effect on models that are Immune to Psychology.

item.name: Hell Flamer
item.description: Flamer weapon, Range 12", S4, AP(1), no stand and shoot, units that suffer one or more casualties must pass a panic test. Misfire: weapon does not fire and model suffers one wound (no saves allowed).

item.name: Hellfire Banner
item.description: PM 2/5+, all enemy units within 12" suffer D6 S5 hits

item.name: Locus of Khorne
item.description: As long as this model is part of a unit the unit gains Eternal Hatred.

item.name: Locus of Nurgle
item.description: As long as this model is part of a unit the unit gains Regeneration (6+).

item.name: Locus of Slaanesh
item.description: As long as this model is part of a unit the unit gains ASF.

item.name: Locus of Tzeentch
item.description: As long as this model is part of a unit the unit gains Daemonic Ward Save (4+).

item.name: Master of Sorcery
item.description: Bearer may use one more PD to cast spells than his level allows (BM only).

item.name: Noxious Vapours
item.description: Models in btb contact suffer from ASL

item.name: Nurgles Chosen
item.description: Regeneration (5+)

item.name: Nurgles Rot
item.description: At the start of each players magic phase, all enemy models in btb contact have to roll a D6: on a roll of a6 they suffer a wound with no AS.

item.name: Nurgling Infestation
item.description: Any model that attacks this model in cc suffers a single S3 hit.

item.name: Obsidian Armour
item.description: 3+AS that cannot be improved further

item.name: PM Clairvoyance 2/3+
PM Clairvoyance 3/3+
item.description: Target one unit on the board. Your opponent has to reveal any hidden models and magic items (but not which model has them) in that unit.

item.name: PM Dark Fury 2/5+
PM Dark Fury 3/5+
item.description: Augment, Range 18", unit rerolls to-wound rolls of natural 1s until the casters next magic phase

item.name: PM Eye of the Gods 2/5+
PM Eye of the Gods 3/5+
item.description: Augment, Range 12", If the spell was cast successfully roll a D6 and consult the table below. The effect lasts until the casters next magic phase. A unit may only ever benefit of one Eye of the Gods effect at the same time, i.e. a second (or further) effect replaces the currently active effect. If the target consists of a unit with joined character models, only roll once and apply the result to all elements. If any element has the Favour of the Gods special rule then the roll may be modified by 1 once (i.e. independent of the actual number of Favours in the unit). 1: Immune to Psychology 2: Cause Fear (cause Terror if already cause fear) 3: AP (1) (cc and missile weapons) 4: unit rerolls 1s to hit (cc and missile weapons) 5: Poisoned Attacks (1) (cc and missile weapons) 6: +1 Toughness

item.name: PM Nurgles Blessing 2/6+
PM Nurgles Blessing 3/6+
item.description: Augment, Range 18", unit gets +1T until the casters next magic phase. Has no effect on character models.

item.name: PM Second Sign of Amul 2/6+
PM 2nd Sign of Amul 3/6+
item.description: The player gets D3 rerolls. Each reroll can be used to reroll one to-hit roll, to-wound roll, armour save, ward save or regeneration roll. Any rerolls not used at the end of the players turn are wasted.

item.name: PM Seeping Pus 2/5+
PM Seeping Pus 3/5+
item.description: Augment, Range 18", unit gets Poisoned Attacks (1) (cc as well as shooting), until the casters next magic phase. If the unit already has Poisoned Attacks, increase its value by +1. Has no effect on magic items.

item.name: PM Shroud of Darkness 2/5+
PM Shroud of Darkness 3/6+
item.description: Augment, Range 18", 5+ Ward Save vs ranged attacks and spells until the casters next magic phase

item.name: PM Slaaneshs Blessing 2/8+
PM Slaaneshs Blessing 3/8+
item.description: Augment, Range 18", unit gets ASF until the casters next magic phase

item.name: PM Steed of Shadows 2/4+
PM Steed of Shadows 3/4+
item.description: Augment, cast on itself or friendly character model on foot with US1 (in both cases) within 12", model may immediately make a 20" fly movement. This move can be used to leave cc but cannot be used to enter combat (i.e. charging is not possible).

item.name: PM Wrath of Slaanesh 2/5+
PM Wrath of Slaanesh 3/5+
item.description: Augment, Range 18", unit gets AP(1) (cc as well as shooting), until the casters next magic phase. Has no effect on magic items.

item.name: Palanquin of Nurgle
item.description: The Palanquin is a common mount, i.e. it cannot be attacked, it grants a 6+AS to its rider, etc. In addition the model still counts as an infantry model with US1 and therefore cannot be singled out by shooting (under normal circumstances). Also when this model joins a unit, then the unit counts their rank bonus as if the space the Palanquin takes up was filled with rank and file models.

item.name: Paralysis
item.description: ASF

item.name: Plague Flail
item.description: Poisoned Attacks (2)

item.name: Power Familiar
item.description: +1 Power Dice every magic phase, may only be used by the bearer.

item.name: Power Vortex
item.description: During the Daemon players magic phase the model may give up wounds (no saves of any kind allowed) to generate D3 PD per wound which can only be used by this model.

item.name: Rivalry of the Gods
Daemonic Animosity
item.description: Units do not benefit from Inspiring Presence and Hold Your Ground! special rules if they are devoted to an opposing Chaos deity. Khorne and Slaanesh as well as Nurgle and Tzeentch count as opposing.

item.name: Siren Standard
item.description: Units charged by this unit can only choose Hold" as a charge response.

item.name: Skull Banner
item.description: Units shooting at this unit suffer -1BS (to a minimum of 0) for this attack.

item.name: Skull Cannon
item.description: Cannon, Range 36", S10, no AS, D3 wounds, move or shoot, no stand and shoot

item.name: Skull Throne
item.description: Khorne units (including this model) within 6" of this model get one additional attack for each to-hit roll of a natural 6. These additional attacks cannot generate further attacks.

item.name: Slashing Attacks
item.description: This unit may attack a single enemy unit that it moved over in the Remaining Moves phase after it ended its move. The attacked unit suffers a number of S4 hits equal to the number of Screamer models in the unit. Hits are treated as close combat hits and distributed like shooting. Casualties caused in this way do not cause panic tests.

item.name: Slime Trail
item.description: Enemies fighting this model in cc do not gain bonuses for fighting in its flank or rear.

item.name: Soporific Banner
item.description: The unit gains the Soporific Musk special rule.

item.name: Soporific Musk
item.description: Enemy units in btb contact with this unit roll one additional dice when they flee and discard the highest.

item.name: Soul Hunger
item.description: Model rerolls failed to-wound rolls.

item.name: Soulthirster
item.description: Roll a die for each model killed: regain 1W for each 6 rolled (up to starting wounds). Immediately roll when a model is killed and apply the result.

item.name: Spell Destroyer
item.description: Dispel Scroll. On a 4+ BM / 5+ PM the spell is destroyed. One use only.

item.name: Spellcaster
item.description: - this unit may cast one of the following spells in each magic phase: - Pink Flames of Tzeentch (PM X/4+): MM, Range 24", D6+2 S3 hits, AP (1) - Pink Transmutation (PM X/4+): each enemy model in btb with this unit suffers a S4 hit, for each unsaved wound caused in this way add a model to this unit (up to the max. unit size). - The number of casting dice X depends on the size of this unit (including character models): - 1-9 models: X=1 - 10-14 models: X=2 - 15-19 models: X=3 - 20+ models: X=4 - Spells cannot be lost through a miscast

item.name: Staff of Nurgle
item.description: PM 2/8+, Effulgent Boils spell

item.name: Stream of Bile
item.description: Breath weapon, S4

item.name: Tentacles
item.description: Model in btb loses 1A, Chaos player may choose which model and which attack.

item.name: Tormentor
item.description: One model of the Daemon players choice in btb with the model takes a Ld test at the start of each cc phase. If failed victim has to attack his own unit or any model in btb contact (Daemon players choice). Wounds inflicted count for combat resolution. Has no effect on models that are Immune to Psychology. If there are no legal targets, the model does not attack at all.

item.name: Twin Heads
item.description: +2 to cast spells (PM/BM)

item.name: Twisted Reality
item.description: Spell Ranges increased by 6", has no effect on spells without range

item.name: Tzeentchs Blessing
item.description: Model ignores all miscast effects (i.e. the casting still fails but do not roll on the miscast table) (BM and PM).

item.name: Tzeentchs Chosen
item.description: Model may reroll a single dice per game. (to-hit, towound, saving throw, characteristic test (inlc. Ld), casting and dispelling).

item.name: Tzeentchs Will
item.description: Model may reroll a single dice per turn. (to-hit, towound, saving throw, characteristic test (inlc. Ld), casting and dispelling).

item.name: Unreliable
item.description: This unit has to roll on its misfire chart if it suffers a misfire.

item.name: Upgrade Level 2 Wizard
item.description: Model becomes a Level 2 wizard.

item.name: Warp Catapult
item.description: Catapult, Range 6"-36", 3" Template, S4(8), no AS, D3 wounds, no stand and shoot, may move and shoot but the model is only allowed to use its BS when it stayed stationary. Misfire: weapon does not fire and model suffers one wound (no saves allowed).

item.name: Winged Horror
item.description: The model can fly and counts as a Flying Model.

item.name: RX
item.description: Daemonic Gifts
